channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: AI demand briefly catapults Nvidia into $1 trillion club
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Nvidia share prices have more than tripled since October last year as demand for AI tech surges.

item.title: Yield farming app accumulates $12M TVL 2 weeks after launch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Origin Ether app deposits Ether into Curve, Convex, stETH, rETH and sfrxETH.

item.title: Nansen lays off 30% of its workforce
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The CEO of Nansen cited two reasons for the layoffs, including an overly aggressive hiring phase during the bull market and the prolonged crypto bear market that followed.

item.title: Researchers propose new scheme to help courts test deanonymized blockchain data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A team of researchers proposed five “argumentative schemes” designed to protect the rights of crypto crime suspects while also helping investigators.

item.title: US CFTC issues letter on digital asset derivatives, clearing compliance in 3 areas
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The letter is a reminder, but a highly specific one that is reminiscent of the SEC’s recent custody rule proposal in part.

item.title: AI experts sign doc comparing risk of ‘extinction from AI’ to pandemics, nuclear war
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The “Godfather of AI” and the CEOs of OpenAI, Google DeepMind and Anthropic are among the hundreds of signatories.

item.title: Crypto exchange Bybit exits Canada, citing ‘recent regulatory development’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Headquartered in Dubai, Bybit plans to leave Canada while exploring expansion into new markets like Kazakhstan.

item.title: Some SBF charges will be dropped if Bahamas objects, U.S. prosecutors say
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The charges relating to Sam Bankman-Fried’s alleged bank fraud, operating an unlicensed money transmitter service and bribing Chinese officials may be dropped.

item.title: Bitcoin on-chain and options data hint at a decisive move in BTC price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: BTC’s historically low volatility could abruptly change in June, with long-term holders making moves and options traders showing an uptick in bearish positions.

item.title: US district judge sends matter of FTX independent examiner to appellate court
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A bankruptcy judge denied a motion for an independent examiner in February, leading to an appeal that may now go to the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit.

item.title: SEC settles case against Wahi brothers for Coinbase insider trading
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The SEC suit alleged former Coinbase product manager Ishan Wahi and his brother used non-public knowledge to trade digital asset securities.

item.title: Why is XRP price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is XRP price up today
item.description: XRP's daily active address count has soared to its second-highest level in May, raising traders' anticipation for a price rally.

item.title: Binance considers allowing traders to secure collateral at banks: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: It has been reported that Swiss-based FlowBank and Liechtenstein-based Bank Frick have been mentioned as potential intermediaries for this service.

item.title: Japan’s largest airline launches NFT marketplace
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The platform is part of All Nippon Airways’ ongoing expansion into the intersection of airlines and Web3.

item.title: Bitcoin’s next rally may be imminent, on-chain analyst says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: On-chain data shows that an imminent Bitcoin rally could drive its price up to $32,000, says Glassnode lead analyst James Check.

item.title: Tether moves into Bitcoin mining in Uruguay
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: As part of its expansion into mining, Tether cited Uruguay’s capability of generating 94% of its electricity from renewable sources, including wind and solar.

item.title: Decentralized exchange PancakeSwap moves into GameFi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The DEX has partnered with BNB GameFi protocol Mobox to create a blockchain tower defense game.

item.title: Bitcoin price rejects at $28K as analysts eye CME futures gap dip
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price action sees weakness a day from the May monthly close, with Bitcoin analysts closely monitoring bid liquidity.

item.title: LSD for DeFi: Tenet, LayerZero partner to drive cross-chain liquid staking adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Cross-chain interoperability protocol LayerZero’s infrastructure aims to drive liquid staking adoption across the DeFi ecosystem.

item.title: What the ‘anti-mining bill’ means for the crypto industry in Texas
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The Lone Star State has become one of the hottest points on the U.S. map in terms of crypto regulation.

item.title: Bitcoin is on a collision course with ‘Net Zero’ promises
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Monty Munford
item.description: Every year countries are pressured to ramp up their climate change commitments at the COP conference — and Bitcoin mining is an easy target.

item.title: The future of DeFi is ReFi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Parker McCurley
item.description: The key to unlocking this transformation and propelling the industry forward lies in embracing the regenerative economy.

item.title: What is fair use? US Supreme Court weighs in on AI’s copyright dilemma
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Many firms with generative AI models are being sued for copyright infringement, and the Supreme Court may have just ruined their primary legal defense.

item.title: BitFlyer adopts crypto deposit limits to comply with Travel Rule
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: While adopting restrictions on transactions between exchanges, bitFlyer still supports transactions to and from self-custody wallets like MetaMask.

item.title: 2 key security practices for Web3 startups from Israel Crypto Conference
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Shahar Madar, the head of security products at Fireblocks, says Web3 startups need to think from the “attacker’s perspective” when planning security protocols.

item.title: Security firm discovers $500M vulnerability in Tron multisig accounts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: After reporting the vulnerability to Tron in February, the researchers highlighted that the issue was promptly addressed and resolved within a few days.

item.title: Bitcoin Ordinals to bridge Ethereum NFTs with the launch of BRC-721E
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The BRC-721E token standard was launched by the Ordinals market and the Bitcoin Miladys NFT collection, allowing traders to transfer their ERC-721 NFTs to Ordinals.

item.title: Wintermute moves over $4M of Optimism tokens to Binance ahead of OP unlock
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: On-chain analytics platform Spot on Chain reported that Wintermute sold the tokens at $1.63 per OP.

item.title: Popular NFT collections take massive price hit in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Investments in top NFT projects such as Doodles, Invisible Friends, Moonbirds and Goblintown have lost up to 95% of their value in Ether.

item.title: Bitcoin selling for $5K cheaper on Binance Australia as fiat ramp closes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: One Bitcoin can be bought for the equivalent of $22,000 on Binance Australia if paid using Australian dollars. The problem is getting the funds there.
